description: This table contains the case instructions information for the surgical case (ORC) record.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedural case record.

columns.name: INSTRUCTION_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of instructions on this line.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Scheduling


Patient


Nursing


Pre-proc Prep


Position

columns.name: INSTRXNS_EDITED_YN
columns.description:
Has the instructions record on this line been edited since it was last built?


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
